name: Qu-tros
description:
A hyper complex form of block dropping.
Up to 4 blocks rain down simultaneously.
Juggle, shift and spin blocks to build goals.

Avoid dangerous items that give you lots of points,
while also trying not to build yourself into a trap

Bigger stage and many more shapes than that other game.

Surprise items.

Qu-tros is ever-evolving. New levels and game modes will be added over time at no extra cost.
